title: Support for Chinene Elders
description: In this short video, elders from the Chinene community in the UNHCR camp of Minawao express their support for the documentation of their language and culture. Directed by Dr. Pierpaolo Di Carlo. Created by MINAWAO YOUTH project.

title: Dughwede Cultural Story
description: An elderly man explains how their forefathers used to build rooms for shelter, using mud and stones. Insights into traditional construction methods in the Dughwede community.
